label: 永治二年真言院御修法記
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: えいじにねんしんごんいんみしほき
見出し読み_mod: えいじにねんしんごんいんみしほき
説明文: Eiji ninen Shingon'in mishiho ki (J.) 永治二年真言院御修法記, also pronounced Eiji ninen Shingon'in mishuhō ki. Account by Kanjin of the Latter Seven-Day Rite of which he was the leading officiant in 1142.
